namespaces.name: std::this_thread
namespaces.description: Contains functions and types related to the current thread.

classes.name: thread
classes.description: Represents a single thread of execution.

functions.name: get_id
functions.description: Returns the unique identifier of the thread.

functions.name: join
functions.description: Blocks the calling thread until the thread represented by *this has finished execution.

functions.name: detach
functions.description: Marks the thread represented by *this as detached.

functions.name: swap
functions.description: Swaps the state of *this with the state of other.

classes.name: thread::id
classes.description: Represents a unique identifier of a thread.

functions.name: hash
functions.description: Provides a hash value for a thread::id object.

classes.name: hardware_concurrency
classes.description: Returns the number of concurrent threads supported by the implementation.

functions.name: thread::yield
functions.description: Offers a hint to the implementation to reschedule the execution of threads.

functions.name: this_thread::sleep_for
functions.description: Blocks the execution of the calling thread for at least the specified sleep_duration.

functions.name: this_thread::sleep_until
functions.description: Blocks the execution of the calling thread until specified time_point has been reached.
